title: Fragments, 1775–95
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
dimensions:
A. Warp: 175.5cm (69in.). Weft: 34cm ( 13 1/2in.)
B. Warp: 118cm (46 1/2in.) Weft; 34cm (13 1/2in.)
A had right selvedge only, B has partial selvedge on the right.
description: Two fragments showing couples in amorous scenes. In brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 1775–95.
1775–95. Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-114-a,b.
